#summary Sample applications distributed with gwt-gadgets

= Gadgets Library Example =

=== HelloGadgets ===

 [http://gwt-google-apis.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/HelloGadgets-2.png]

A basic demonstration of writing a gadget using GWT.

To deploy, open [http://www.igoogle.com iGoogle].  Choose the _Add Stuff..._ link on the top right of the main page, then on the bottom left of the next page, choose the _Add Feed or Url_ link.  When the dialog comes up,  add the following url:

  `http://gwt.google.com/samples/hellogadgets-1.2.0/hellogadgets/HelloGadgets.gadget.xml`

Select `OK` to add the gadget to your home page.

Other gadgets you can try:

   * An example of how to use GWT RPC with a gadget.
  `http://gwt.google.com/samples/gadgetrpc-1.2.0/gadgetrpc/GadgetRPC.gadget.xml`

   * An example of how to host an Ad in a gadget written with GWT.
  `http://gwt.google.com/samples/basicgadgetads-1.2.0/basicgadgetads/BasicGadgetAds.gadget.xml`

   * An example of how to use the Open Social API on a gadget hosted on App Engine
  `http://gwt.google.com/samples/traveler-1.2.0/basicgadgetads/Traveler.gadget.xml`
